newsitem.title: USA: Banc One signs letter to acquire Fitzgerald, Davis.
newsitem.headline: Banc One signs letter to acquire Fitzgerald, Davis.

text.p: Banc One Capital Corp, an affiliate of Banc One Corporation, announced Thursday it has signed a letter of intent to acquire and consolidate the sales and trading operations of Chicago-based Fitzgerald, Davis & Associates LP.

Fitzgerald, Davis is a five year old broker-dealer specializing in high-grade municipal bonds that will provide Banc One with expanded capabilities in municipal secondary market sales and trading, Banc One said.
"This acquisition strengthens our distribution of tax exempt securities in the Midwest," Banc One Vice Chairman James Chapman said.
The acquisition is expected to be final in late July. Banc One operates 1,502 offices in 12 states.
